name: Greebs in Space: The Case of the Tricky Blue Fellow (GGJ 2020)
name_original: Greebs in Space: The Case of the Tricky Blue Fellow (GGJ 2020)
description:
After boarding the SS Space, your mission is to stop the crew from space repairing their ship by sabotaging their systems and taking out the people on board.

A full blown FMV game with REAL visuals. Watch, interact, and scream in delight as you kill off the crew of the SS Space!
